title: ‘YUVA AI for ALL’: Govt launches free course to help citizens learn Artificial Intelligence, details inside
description: MeitY, under the IndiaAI Mission, has launched ‘YUVA AI for ALL’, a free national programme to help Indians—especially students—learn the basics of artificial intelligence.

title: Musk’s xAI in advanced talks to raise $15 billion in equity at $230 billion valuation: Report
description: Elon Musk’s artificial-intelligence startup xAI is in advanced talks to raise $15 billion in fresh equity at a valuation of $230 billion, the Wall Street Journal reported on Tuesday.
content:
Elon Musk’s artificial-intelligence start-up xAI is in advanced talks to raise $15 billion in fresh equity at a valuation of $230 billion, the Wall Street Journal reported on Tuesday.

title: Google unveils Gemini's next generation, aiming to turn its search engine into a 'thought partner'
description: Google is unleashing its Gemini 3 artificial intelligence model on its dominant search engine and other popular online services in the high-stakes battle to create technology that people can trust to enlighten them and manage tedious tasks.

title: The Use of AI in Real Estate Marketing
description: Byline: Will Jones Over the last few years, many industries have been exponentially redefined by introducing a new digital tool: AI. When it was first introduced to the public, AI was met with skepticism at best and outright derision at worst. title: Asian shares retreat in cautious trading ahead of Nvidia's profit report
description: Asian shares have retreated in cautious trading Wednesday ahead of an earnings report from Nvidia that is seen as a bellwether for the recent craze for artificial intelligence technology. title: Brookfield seeks $10 billion for new AI infrastructure fund, WSJ reports
